remarks: Propagate component extraction to a structure ` T ` from a subset structure ` S ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2014.)
statement:
strss.t $e |- T e. _V $.
strss.f $e |- Fun T $.
strss.s $e |- S C_ T $.
strss.e $e |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) $.
strss.n $e |- <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. e. S $.
strss $p |- ( E ` T ) = ( E ` S ) $.
